name: kielbasa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sausage, often smoked (= flavoured and preserved using smoke), that is originally from Poland: Kielbasa - also known as Polish sausage - is a seasoned, smoked sausage usually made from pork. They serve sandwiches (pulled pork or brisket), smoked kielbasas and wings.
More examplesFewer examplesThe polka dancing, pirogues, and kielbasa all capture the culture of an area where European immigrants once came for jobs.At the afternoon picnic, Kerry and his supporters ate hamburgers, hot dogs and kielbasa spiced with an array of sauces.Place the chops and kielbasa on top of the sauerkraut, and sprinkle with fresh parsley.
